* Sprite_Sheets, a new system to allow for better species (#5363)

* Initial Commit

* Basic species_restricted implementation

species_restricted bitfield & bitflags. Handling for it as well. Updated all species datums to contain their ID macro and bodytype bitflag.

* Changed sprite sheets to a bitfield. Update Icons now reads the bitfield and calls the specie's get_custom_icons() proc.

* Got ahead of my self. Fixed errors

* Debugged all the primary slots

Leaving debug icons and stuff in for now to make my life easier, and so its easier to see whats going on

* First review ready

Removed debug spritesheets. Added a prototype species-based hand offset system.

* Updates comments and adds debug species for reference

* Should pass unit tests now

* Fuck you unit test

* Fixes inv slots

Ill write a seethe post about this later. Fucking TG.

* Anonymizes chapel intercom, so chaplain doesn't know who's talking. (#54476) (#5451)

It adds a new layer of immersion, and the option to anonizmie the speaker adds new options for mappers.

* pressure valve part 1

* Fix and tweak pressure valve (#53362)

* replace pump_gas_to to release_gas_to

release_gas_to Releases gas from src to output air. This means that it can not transfer air to gas mixture with higher pressure.

* Set max target_pressure to ONE_ATMOSPHERE*50

Since this not real pump and it pump gas based on air.pressure, why we cant set any limit?

* remove double update_icon_nopipes()

* Some more precise description

* Some more pressure

Replace pump_gas_to to release_gas_to
release_gas_to releases gas from src to output air. This means that it can not transfer air to gas mixture with higher pressure.

Increased max trigger pressure settings to 100 atmospheres, since volume_pump limited 9000 kPa (~90 atmospheres)

Bugs is bad.
Atmos is good.

* More list related components for WireMod (#5439)

* added list constructor component and allowed arbitrary input port components to specify different types for inputs and outputs.

* Added some extra options to the index component

* rebased most of index component into new abstract component to handle list indexes, as well as added a write component to change list values

* added append component an fixed bug where components would modify lists in input ports directly instead of creating a modfified copy.

* Added another list constructor and made the index port of the indexer component a number port instead of an any port

* Pop component, prevented append component from going over the maximum size, and moved around some ports to make things look nicer.

* Makes the wiremod list component category visible on the component printer

* utilized existing procs

* cleaned up some selection

* List components now need to be researched, and list constructors have higher power cost

* Update code/modules/wiremod/components/list/list_length_constructor.dm

Co-authored-by: Archanial <37456678+Archanial@users.noreply.github.com>

* indexer options are now a static list.

* makes the list constructor access the list typepath instead of an undefined var named 'list'

* removed a problematic early return

Co-authored-by: Archanial <37456678+Archanial@users.noreply.github.com>

* Initial Commit

* Basic species_restricted implementation

species_restricted bitfield & bitflags. Handling for it as well. Updated all species datums to contain their ID macro and bodytype bitflag.

* Changed sprite sheets to a bitfield. Update Icons now reads the bitfield and calls the specie's get_custom_icons() proc.

* Got ahead of my self. Fixed errors

* Debugged all the primary slots

Leaving debug icons and stuff in for now to make my life easier, and so its easier to see whats going on

* First review ready

Removed debug spritesheets. Added a prototype species-based hand offset system.

* Updates comments and adds debug species for reference

* Should pass unit tests now

* Fuck you unit test

* Fixes inv slots

Ill write a seethe post about this later. Fucking TG.

* Fix and tweak pressure valve (#53362)

* replace pump_gas_to to release_gas_to

release_gas_to Releases gas from src to output air. This means that it can not transfer air to gas mixture with higher pressure.

* Set max target_pressure to ONE_ATMOSPHERE*50

Since this not real pump and it pump gas based on air.pressure, why we cant set any limit?

* remove double update_icon_nopipes()

* Some more precise description

* Some more pressure

Replace pump_gas_to to release_gas_to
release_gas_to releases gas from src to output air. This means that it can not transfer air to gas mixture with higher pressure.

Increased max trigger pressure settings to 100 atmospheres, since volume_pump limited 9000 kPa (~90 atmospheres)

Bugs is bad.
Atmos is good.

* More list related components for WireMod (#5439)

* added list constructor component and allowed arbitrary input port components to specify different types for inputs and outputs.

* Added some extra options to the index component

* rebased most of index component into new abstract component to handle list indexes, as well as added a write component to change list values

* added append component an fixed bug where components would modify lists in input ports directly instead of creating a modfified copy.

* Added another list constructor and made the index port of the indexer component a number port instead of an any port

* Pop component, prevented append component from going over the maximum size, and moved around some ports to make things look nicer.

* Makes the wiremod list component category visible on the component printer

* utilized existing procs

* cleaned up some selection

* List components now need to be researched, and list constructors have higher power cost

* Update code/modules/wiremod/components/list/list_length_constructor.dm
